website_summaries.verdict: A stylish and functional "shabby chic" cabby armoire. Plenty of space for jewelry hidden behind the french style drawers.
pros: This hand-painted cabby armoire featured distressed accents
Two French doors reveal eight necklace hooks on each door, and lots of storage drawers, with compartments
Arrives fully assembled – just need to screw the legs on
cons: Lacquer has a very strong smell out of the box that takes a while to subside

customer_reviews.title: Nice fully locking jewelry armoire.
customer_reviews.text: There's not many fully locking affordable jewelry armoires on the market so I was happy to find this one which is not only functional but also cute. I like that the drawers are inside of the cabinet and you need to open the doors to get to them. They won't open unless the lid is lifted. This helps me keep my toddler away from my jewelry. My only complaint is that drawers are not on rails so they hang down when you pull them out causing jewelry to slide down. Also two bolts on the lid don't align perfectly so i have to pull the door slightly to properly close the lid. Overall however, I am happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Aleksandra & Tom

customer_reviews.title: I recommend this!!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and perfect! Its big which is good cause i have alot of jewelry. Delivery was quick and it arrived with no damage.Really happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Sargent

customer_reviews.title: Look at the pictures closely & as big as you can for the distressing
customer_reviews.text: So very nicely put together. Love the color. But you need to look closely at the pictures. This is very distressed and not the way that I think of distressed. I looked at multiple websites and pictures and did not see it. So if you like the pictures you will love it. The insides are beautiful with lots of space. They also have nice costumer service along with Amazon. I am giving it four stars because it is sturdy and the company was really nice to deal with. I like everything about except how it is distressed.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Was Just Okay
customer_reviews.text: The cabinet color is exactly as pictured, and is solidly constructed. What I did not realize was the lining material is a burlap texture, I was expecting it to be soft and velvety. The drawers hang forward and are held in place wit small wooden dowels. There were instructions on how to attach the lid, but not the feet. Took me a little bit of time to figure it out. Had I known about the material and how the drawers are not well supported I would not have purchased it, but I do love the color of it. See pictures.
customer_reviews.author: C. Yanez

customer_reviews.title: Lots of storage , but damaged during shipping
customer_reviews.text: It's a very nice piece, but the lower portion of this armoire that rests inside the box on styrofoam came damaged, but the box had no damage. Appears to be a hit or miss in terms of quality . The drawers do tilt down, which scared me a bit thinking the drawer was going to fall off. Easy assembly. For the price, i feel like it's a good deal. Just hope if you buy that it doesn't come damaged.
customer_reviews.author: ohdannyboy

customer_reviews.title: Simply gorgeous
customer_reviews.text: This is gorgeous. I looked forever for a nice jewelry armoire. The drawers only open when the mirror is lifted up so keep that in mind. It's heavy. I had to take out all the drawers and drag it to my closet. I think it ways 50 lbs. My only gripe with it is the doors tilt down when you open them. They are locked in place so they don't fall out, but I wish it were a little better made so the drawers opened flat. Small price to pay for something so good-looking and useful. It even has a lock. Also keep in mind, it's big. This is not a jewelry box. It's a piece of furniture.
customer_reviews.author: ETG

customer_reviews.title: Great jewelry armoire
customer_reviews.text: I had been eyeing this jewelry armoire for over a year, wanting it but wondering if it was worth the price. And I can say, it definitely is! I need something sturdy, that my rambunctious son would not topple over. This armoire is definitely heavy and sturdy and is in no danger of tipping over. In addition, the lock prevents him from getting in. It's a wonderful accent piece of furniture and has plenty of room for not only my jewelry, but also other treasures like perfume, nail polish, my journals, etc. I love this armoire!
customer_reviews.author: Julia F.

customer_reviews.title: Love, Love, Love This Turquoise Armoire
customer_reviews.text: It was just delivered yesterday and I looked on Amazon today and they have all been sold and not sure when or if they will get it back it but if they do, it is nice. It has spacious drawers. It is bigger than a lot of other armoires because I have been comparison shopping and reading reviews because I wanted one bad. Teal is my favorite color so this was meant to be. I hope they get back in stock for others who need one.
customer_reviews.author: vriggin24

customer_reviews.title: She's into the "shabby chic" stuff so if any of you guys are looking for a nice gift for the wife
customer_reviews.text: My wife "LOVES IT"!! She's into the "shabby chic" stuff so if any of you guys are looking for a nice gift for the wife, and she's mentioned liking shabby whatever, this will do it! Amazon had the best price on this item too. Let me also add that it's pretty well made for the price. Nice finish, lots of drawers, and comes with little pockets and ring holders, etc.
customer_reviews.author: nihilist ninny

customer_reviews.title: Great quality piece
customer_reviews.text: I will start by saying that I LOVE this piece!! It is not only beautiful, but it actually holds my massive jewelry collection. Which has been scattered in several different pieces. The only thing I would change (and the reason for 4 stars) is I wish it had more small sections for earrings. Definitely not a deal breaker for me, but worth mentioning. Overall, the quality of this piece seems very nice and is very heavy compared to some of the others that I have had in the past.
customer_reviews.author: GypsyRoots

customer_reviews.title: A pleasant surprise
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this because it was the only one with a fully locking system that was within my price bracket. Although I wasn't wild about the turquoise blue color, functionality and price trumped beauty. To my surprise, when the armoire arrived I fell in love with the color! It is not nearly as blue as in the photos and has a muted matte blue-green finish that goes very well with the Caribbean colors of the room. It was super easy to assemble and everything works perfectly. One small details is that I need to give one door a little jiggle to get the locking mechism to line up with the holes in the lid. Otherwise, it is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Jo R.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, great price, and great design
customer_reviews.text: We spent a good week searching for jewelry armoire's, and its almost impossible to find one with a locking mechanism that's not completly useless/for aesthetic purposes only. On top of that, the design of this armorie is such that you can padlock the front, giving an additional layer of security. We always do that when we'll be traveling for a while. The build quality of this thing is robust, with solid wood throughout, and nothing squeeks/wobbles as you often see with furniture from places like Ikea. Don't know how we would be managing our jewelry without this!
customer_reviews.author: alpineElephant

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!!
customer_reviews.text: I got this in the turquoise color. It arrived extremely well packaged, was very easy to put together and best of all it exceeded all my expectations. It is very well made, sturdy and much heavier than I expected. Definitely a piece made to last. Even long enough to pass down if taken care of. I'd even venture to say the quality can't be beat for the price. I'm going to use it for both jewelry and makeup. If you're on the fence about purchasing, go for it, I honestly don't think you'll be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: kris10

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Armoire
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful armoire! When we moved recently our movers took apart my standing armoire and turned it upside down resulting in tangling all of my jewelry and breaking the interior of the armoire. They refused to take any responsibility and I was left in a mess. So back to Amazon for a solution and this is almost perfect. I did have to add some dividers in the drawers, but other than that I love it. It was easy to assemble and looks great in my room. I would recommend this to anyone looking for a spacious, sturdy jewelry case.
customer_reviews.author: D Redding

customer_reviews.title: I love this jewelry box
customer_reviews.text: I love this jewelry box! Beautiful accent piece in a room full of oak furniture. Packaged very well and easy to put top and legs on. Holds a lot. Went from a large jewelry box and 2 baskets full of jewelry with room to spare! Price was great as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good storage solution for jewelry
customer_reviews.text: This is super cute and assembled pretty easily. Tons of storage in the drawers for lots of jewelry. I feel much more organized and I’m wearing pieces I haven’t in a long time because they are easy to find now. The top doesn’t close perfectly due to the way it locks, not a big deal you just have to pull slightly on the door to get it to line up right. The drawers don’t slide in and out super easily but they have pegs that stop you from pulling them all the way out which is very handy. Overall, I would buy it again because of the price and value for money.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara L. Rice

customer_reviews.title: Smooth, perfectly finished...
customer_reviews.text: Smooth, perfect finish in the exact color shown. It stores a lot of jewelry but comes without inserts for most of the drawers. It would be nice if the manufacturer offered more inserts that we could purchase separately. Easy to attach the feet and fill it up with watches, necklaces, rings, bracelets. I've added my own tray to accommodate rings. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Trish the Dish

customer_reviews.title: Cabinet's Hardware at Top Does Not Line Up Correctly so It Can't be Locked
customer_reviews.text: After I assembled everything (easy) and put all of my jewelry in the cabinet, I closed the top and found that the two pieces of hardware on the opening top piece, that are supposed to go into the holes at the top of the cabinet to be able to lock it, aren't lined up properly, so it can't close. I don't want to return it as it is very nice but am at a loss as to what to do. Please have the seller contact me for direction. Also it is not distressed as advertised but solid turquoise, but I like it anyway.
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Best Mother’s Day Ever
customer_reviews.text: Yep - those were the words of my wife today. I ordered this attractive jewelry box as a replacement to an old one she had that was falling apart. It truly is a good looking piece of furniture with plenty of storage. Added bonus of a decent locking device.
customer_reviews.author: Keith A. Rosdahl

customer_reviews.title: GORGEOUS but needs the $30 earring trays
customer_reviews.text: GORGEOUS! Almost exactly what I’ve been wanting to house all my jewelry in one place. The only bummer is there are no individual earring compartments. I held off on buying the Hives and Honey earring tray inserts for $30, turns out I’ll need them.
customer_reviews.author: Andersen Boyer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect COLOR/SIZE/Traditional STYLE
customer_reviews.text: What sold me on this piece was not only the style, color and size. But the 🔐 feature 😌. Took my guy no time to piece this together. Well worth the 💰💰💳
customer_reviews.author: Theresa C.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful armoire but some difficulty putting top and legs on
customer_reviews.text: Quality armoire however had some difficulty putting together as some of the screw holes didn't match up. Not a big deal but a tad frustrating. One of the feet wasn't drilled correctly and one side of the top wasn't correct. Easily remedied but for the price wish it would have been correct straight out of the box. The armoire is well made and sturdy. Purchased as a gift for my daughter. She loves it and it has plenty of space for her growing jewelry collection.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly V.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent jewelry armoire - except shipping process
customer_reviews.text: We love this jewelry armoire, but we are giving 4 stars instead of 5 specifically because of the shipment process, not the product itself. It took not one, not two, but three shipments to receive an armoire that didn't have any chips or cracks in it. Make sure you contact Amazon after placing the order and ask them to have UPS ship it and *handle it with care*, then inspect the product before removing the packaging, box, etc. Once you get an undamaged product you'll love it. Very little assembly, tons of storage, and a beautiful piece.
customer_reviews.author: MariaNYC

customer_reviews.title: Please see how drawers tilt!!!! Everything slides
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had read more of the reviews talking about the drawers tilting down! Everything slides down. I’ve never had any piece of furniture with drawers like this before. I realize it was only $212, but still. It’s a beautiful piece and love everything else about it but would have never had purchased because of this flaw or poor design.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and well made with lots of space
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and sturdy. Holds a lot of things, plenty of room. The lock is a nice feature and works well. I'm happy I purchased this! It arrived much earlier than expected too!
customer_reviews.author: Angebella77

customer_reviews.title: Screw are too tiny .
customer_reviews.text: Money will spend ,is beautiful , perfect size and color just as described , and easily installed,only things that is concerned is the top cover are very heavy with mirrors, the 5 screws that come with it are very tiny , I am not sure if you open too often , possible the MDF may not hold the weight,but overall I still giving 5 stars, because it just looks so good.
customer_reviews.author: Yuan Lavine

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely delighted with this purchase!
customer_reviews.text: This is a gorgeous jewelry armoire, and I'm so happy I got it. It was very easy to assemble by myself, though I admit another pair of hands would have been helpful to get it out of the shipping carton! The color is beautiful, exactly as represented, and exactly what I was looking for. The doors close with a metal "button" on one side and a magnet on the other, and the only problem I'm having is that the button on one of the doors won't stay put; will probably have to glue it or something.
customer_reviews.author: kaf

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful piece of furniture.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a gift to myself. I am extremely pleased with the cabinet. I was able to assemble the legs myself. It is heavy but manageable. I love it and am so glad I purchased it. The only draw back I found is that when you slide the drawers out they are on pegs so they tilt a bit. However, once your are use to it you adjust. The color is exactly as pictured and it matches my decor perfectly. My jewelry is organized and easy to find. As I have a lot of earrings I did order extra earring trays to put inside of the drawers and it worked perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No wood:(
customer_reviews.text: Made out of pressed cardboard, whatever you call that. It looks nice and has a lot of room but it is not a quality piece of furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Shawna Maker

customer_reviews.title: True to advertisement, but may have scratches
customer_reviews.text: Overall great product, but just like other reviews, when I unpacked the product, there were a few nicks on the smooth side panels (it was not part of the distressed look). The product was packaged well in a bunch of styrofoam so the little scratches had to have been on it before it was packaged and shipped. Other than that small issue, the product itself looked just like the images shown and the color was nice and vibrant. My mom definitely loves this accent piece!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Mendoza

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Armoire with loads of space
customer_reviews.text: Love my locking Hives and Honey Jewelry Armoire. Plenty of room for my jewelry with lots of pull out drawers where I placed some compartments for smaller jewelry. Hooks on both sides for my necklaces with a string across to keep necklaces from getting caught in the door. A pretty color that is as described plus easy to put together. I would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Griggs

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Love, love , love this piece!! Very sturdy, great quality, super easy to put legs on. Mirror was super easy to attach.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: That it's made well.
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for a birthday gift for my daughter I like the fact that it held all of her jewelry. And did it was a cool color. I myself have not seen it in person I had it sent directly to her. I'm just going by what she has told me she really likes it
customer_reviews.author: gayla yoder

customer_reviews.title: Better Than Expected
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised that it came almost fully assembled - ai just needed to screw on the legs and the mirror. The finish is really nice. There was one small chip in a place you can't see when it's closed, not worth returning it over. My wife loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas J. Happ

customer_reviews.title: Quality for a reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: I looked & looked for a jewelry chest that I could lock completely. Meaning all the sections that held my jewelry. I finally found this one, only one that would safely store my jewelry that I have collected over these many years. I am very pleased with it; right price, right chest. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Mattie to 3 grandsons

customer_reviews.title: Nice jewelry cabinet
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this jewelry cabinet as a gift for my daughter and she loves it!
customer_reviews.author: suestwo

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and functional!
customer_reviews.text: I love this cabinet! I have a lot of jewellery so this helped me to organize everything. I also like that there's a locking capability so i can keep them secure. The color is slightly darker than in the pictures (the exterior is more teal and the interior is turquoise) but still gorgeous. The doors are slightly misaligned but that doesn't bother me much. Some of the wooden stoppers in the bottom drawers came broken and i can't seem to fix them but i can still use the drawers just fine (i just need to remember not to pull them all the way out). Overall, I'm very satisfied with the purchase :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just beautiful !!
customer_reviews.text: This jewelry armoire is beautiful. I love it and have so much room to put my jewelry. I like that it is fully lockable. I can't brag enough about this item. You won't regret buying it.........it came in perfect condition. I'm so happy with it and the price was great !
customer_reviews.author: Barbie

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I had been looking for a not so traditional looking jewelry armoire and I found it! The color is just as it looks in all the pictures. The lock works perfectly and comes with 2 keys. It has lots of storage for everything I have and more. Shipping was fast and came earlier than expected. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: MandieWebb

customer_reviews.title: Just perfect!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a new jewelry armoire and I was hesitant with ordering this one because of the color. But it ended up being a lighter turquoise with some distressing, so it looks very nice. I am a huge fan of the lock and also the roominess of the armoire. The doors open for your necklaces to reveal many drawers! It holds all of my jewelry with some room....which means I can get more pieces!!!! The cubbies in each drawer work well to organize all your treasures. Assembly was easy and it is a great addition to any room.
customer_reviews.author: April Love Waldo

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: I'm Impressed! This is a very solid piece. The color is even better than pictured (in my opinion). When it arrived the box was damaged in multiple places due to shipping. All the interior packaging was cracked and damaged as well, but not a scratch on the jewelry cabinet. Excellent job packaging!
customer_reviews.author: SnowShannon

customer_reviews.title: Poor craftmenship
customer_reviews.text: Item was delivered damaged, so it had to be returned. Requested refund as item was cheaply made. Drawers & compartments were covered in rough burlap type material with no padding. This was not worth the price I paid.
customer_reviews.author: Annie Oakley

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and high quality locking jewelry cabinet!!
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with my jewelry cabinet. It was easy to assemble, high quality, beautiful color and great design. I love the fact that I can lock it and I have two keys in case I misplace one. The storage capacity was more than I had even anticipated. I couldn’t be happier with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Jaguar

customer_reviews.title: What are you waiting for?! This is a must have!
customer_reviews.text: Seriously, it is exactly what I wanted. Perfect color, height, love how there are some drawers with dividers and some without. Additionally, love how the necklaces can be stored inside of the doors. It’s made out of great quality. Worth the investment. It is very easy to put together, majority of the armoire is already budlit, all that is needed is the legs and mirror to be attached. My Tia saw mine and bought the same exact one.
customer_reviews.author: AvaVictoriaX

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: It exceeded my expectations. It came assembled with exception of legs. The quality is what I was so impressed with. I trusted the previous reviews and purchased it. I am so glad I did. I was afraid it was going to be short or small but it is the perfect size.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Darsey

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy and chips off all
customer_reviews.text: Flimsy. And paint chips off immediately. Smells really bad. The lock doesn’t work after a year!! I wouldn’t buy it again and wouldn’t recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Natasha

customer_reviews.title: Pleased with the quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought this unit to house all of my jewelry accumulated over the years in one place. Everything fits with room to spare. Assembly wasn't too difficult--just needed to put the feet and lid on using a screwdriver. I am pleased with the quality for the price. It is heavier than I thought it would be and the great packaging ensured that it arrived in good condition. I like that it locks too.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce W

customer_reviews.title: At over $200 you should expect more.
customer_reviews.text: Size, capacity and layout are all positives for this item but at a price point well over $200 the level of detail in the engineering of it isn’t that great. The top doesn’t align all that great when you try to close and lock and the locking mechanism and keys are also cheap. At $130-$160 this is a great buy but over $200 I’d scrub your options.
customer_reviews.author: KingSlayer

customer_reviews.title: The turquoise color is beautiful.
customer_reviews.text: The turquoise color is gorgeous. It's shinny with subtle paintbrush strokes and just a hint of the distressed look. This piece is also great size for smaller spaces. It's only about 18" wide and 4' tall, yet it has a substantial amount of storage capacity. It would be perfect for an apartment.
customer_reviews.author: Rhi M

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Item
customer_reviews.text: This armoire arrived packaged very well and in perfect condition. It has some weight to it, which is a bonus in the security department, in my book. It was easy to assemble the top mirror and feet - both included. As I went through my jewelry and organized it all in this case, I kept commenting to myself how well made and lovely it is. It fits so many things, the drawers are sectioned perfectly. Easy to pull out, organize and put back. a very well made and beautiful item.
customer_reviews.author: Rich F.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my needs
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in great condition and was easy to assemble with another person. Bright color with some "worn on purpose" spots, though they are too uniform to be truly "aged." Great size, plenty of storage with various compartments and drawers. Finally, I'm organized with my jewelry!
customer_reviews.author: Monique Z

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice, not a secure lock and not solid wood construction
customer_reviews.text: Looks like the picture. The main body of the unit is pressed wood and twists. Because it twists, the doors pop right open, even when the lid is locked. Not very solid, but to be expected for the low cost.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Gilchrist

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and Sturdy Design!
customer_reviews.text: Lovely armoire that holds so much jewelry. It's not tiny and it's not too big for a corner space. Perfect addition to fit most decor. I saw it comes in antique white too but I bought the turquoise. It's a very pretty color. The details are perfect for my taste as I am very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: pinkchaos12

customer_reviews.title: True to pictures & description
customer_reviews.text: Have been watching this item for about 6 months. Finally decided to purchase. Glad I did - it is a nice piece. It was packed well and the minimal assembly (legs, top) were fairly easy. I'm happy with the color and the amount of storage.
customer_reviews.author: Bubba's mom

customer_reviews.title: Must have if you have a toddler
customer_reviews.text: This is beyond beautiful in person, easy to assemble, great packaging, no damage And bonus it locks so my two year old want escape with my jewelry haha
customer_reviews.author: Haley Rentz

customer_reviews.title: Not pleased
customer_reviews.text: Not much space for storage and the drawers drop down as you open them. Drawers are not secure . Overall not that great. Not worth the price. Quality below average
customer_reviews.author: Jacksonian

customer_reviews.title: Recommend this item highly
customer_reviews.text: The Armoire was shipped from Texas and I reside in Ohio. I was apprehensive since it was being sent during the holiday shipping rush and hoped it wouldnt come damaged. The large, heavy box arrived without any damage and this armoire is one of the most beautiful and sturdy pieces of furniture I have ever seen. Sooo much storage and the antique turquoise color is beautiful. I give the armoire 5 stars and also the shippers.
customer_reviews.author: MommyMae

customer_reviews.title: Quality!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this item very pleased with it I should have gotten the larger one I have lot of costume jewelry. W would by this again in a hearts beat.
customer_reviews.author: HARTJO

customer_reviews.title: So much space for my treasures!
customer_reviews.text: This piece was easily constructed and it looks fantastic. There is a lot of room in this piece of furniture. The color is beautiful. I gave this only 4 stars as I feel the lining inside can be improved upon. I don't like the burlappy feel to the current lining.
customer_reviews.author: Erin E  Meyers

customer_reviews.title: Received damaged, Good customer service, Great product.
customer_reviews.text: We received it damaged :( The doors were cracked where the hinges were screwed in leaving them unstable. The cabinet came with a sheet detailing customer service solutions. We followed the instructions to start a ticket and they sent us new doors to install. The new doors didn't match the rest of the cabinet so we followed filed another ticket and again received doors. This time they worked great. The only downside was that we had a cabinet taking up space until we got the proper replacement parts. Kind of annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Robert W.

customer_reviews.title: arrived damaged
customer_reviews.text: This jewelry armoire arrived damaged, significantly chipped paint. Super annoying given its price and the difficulty in returning such a large item.
customer_reviews.author: RRB

customer_reviews.title: Substantial and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: This armoire is a substantial piece of furniture. I especially like the finish which has a very soft feel and is a magnificent color. It is better than described and super easy to put together. It took me about 20 mintues (with distractions) to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: The doc

customer_reviews.title: Lovely!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and of a high quality, solid build. The picture (when zoomed) shows a higher level of distressing than mine has in reality. Simple to put together, just attach the lid and feet. The biggest challenge, after deciding on a Hives an Honey armoire, is which style to get :)
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Nice Armoir.  Pros and Cons.
customer_reviews.text: Well made. Great color. Nice size. Lots of room for jewelry and stuff. Packaged nicely, so nothing was damaged. CONS: I would expect that the drawers would be on tracks. They are not. They simply slide out - wood on wood. For this price, they should add tracks. Also, I don't believe that the lining is anti-tarnish. It is more of a linen material.
customer_reviews.author: ErieDearie

customer_reviews.title: Great Overall
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. Color is what I expected. Holds a ton of jewelry and accessories. Only thing I would change is I would like to be able to open the 2 doors without having to lift the top piece every time. I understand it's made that way to lock everything up with a key, but for every day use that part is kind of a hassle.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda M

customer_reviews.title: Expensive for the quality of product
customer_reviews.text: It came to my attention too late to return as this was a gift. All the drawers slant down which is absolutely worthless storing jewelry in them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Jewelry Armoire is perfect for me
customer_reviews.text: Love the jewelry armoire. It is a perfect size and color for my bedroom. Very well constructed and designed and adds a beautiful piece of furniture to our room. All the compartments are sized just right and the drawer space was so much that I used it for evening bags, gloves and scarves and socks as well as jewelry. Everyone who sees it loves it too.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Price

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: The product was exactly what I wanted and it more than meets my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Louis A Creola Jr

customer_reviews.title: I was very disappointed though when I opened the box and discovered that ...
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to get this piece. As far as quality goes it gets 5 stars. I was very disappointed though when I opened the box and discovered that the company forgot to pre-drill some of the holes needed to attach the legs. Instead of the simple assembly that it should have been, now I have to have holes drilled out so that I can attach the legs and use it. Bummer!!!
customer_reviews.author: Hanna Jones

customer_reviews.title: Looks good in your bedroom and holds a lot of jewelry!
customer_reviews.text: Overall it look nice and holds a lot. The drawers are not very deep and do not have sliders so you can really only use half unless you pull the drawer out of the cabinet. For the price though, it is great!
customer_reviews.author: Vicki

customer_reviews.title: lots of room in this. Hoping over time the ...
customer_reviews.text: lots of room in this. Hoping over time the top will close (line up) every time, without jiggling. Would buy again. Definitely got my moneys worth!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great color - nice piece of furniture
customer_reviews.text: This chest has lots of room and is a lovely color. It feels very sturdy - I recommend you buy the earring tray inserts for it to make the organization all that much better.
customer_reviews.author: MBMcc

customer_reviews.title: This piece met my high expectations, and the price was incredibly reasonable for the quality
customer_reviews.text: While it is true that the odor of the piece was a bit strong to start (like some other reviews I read prior to purchasing), the smell quickly faded after having left all of the doors open for a few days to air out. I love the color and all of the storage. Mine shipped with zero damage and the set up was easy breezy. I am very, very happy with this choice!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely awesome. Very well crafted. Heavy. Beautifully finished. Plenty of storage. Way more than I expected for the price, I would have paid much more, absolutely happy!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Greagory

customer_reviews.title: Great piece but arrived damaged...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great piece!! I took 2 stars off because it arrived damaged (cracked at the bottom near the leg) and the drawers are cheaply lined. I am keeping it because I really need to get my jewelry organized and once I put the leg on I can hardly notice the crack. Still, it bothers me. Overall, the piece is adorable, great size and will hold a ton of stuff. I just wish it hadn't arrived damaged. I would have overlooked the cheap lining and given it 5 stars in that case.
customer_reviews.author: ABizzity

customer_reviews.title: A Very Satisfied Customer
customer_reviews.text: Love this chest. I have a lot of jewelry and I was able to organize all of my jewelry in this armoire. It is beautifully made and was easy to assemble. Very pleased with this item. Would definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Leigh C. Smith

customer_reviews.title: great color and tons of room
customer_reviews.text: It was exactly as described and pictured. Very well made, great color and tons of room. If you like the picture you will love the armoire! Also very easy to assemble, just had to put feet and top on. It came very well packed without any damage. Very unique piece that adds a great pop of color in our gray toned bedroom. Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: sheri predebon

customer_reviews.title: Good looking, easy to put together and came well packed.
customer_reviews.text: Love this jewelry box. It has plenty of room for my jewelry and then some. Plus it locks. Very sturdy. Came well packed, easy to put together. I put it together myself. Looks very nice.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Nice Piece
customer_reviews.text: Everything fits just fine. Looks attractive in our Master Bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff and Molly

customer_reviews.title: Nice place to hide a lot of jewelry
customer_reviews.text: Quick shipping, very little assembly required, nice finish on the outside (inside not a match, slightly different color non distressed turquoise). Should make inserts for organizing, that would be fabulous.
customer_reviews.author: zannsu

customer_reviews.title: Jewelry Box
customer_reviews.text: I was beyond happy with my jewelry box. I love the color. It is very well made drawers are all lined . I love it
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for all my jewelry
customer_reviews.text: I make jewelry, so I need something large to hold all of my jewelry. This was a great fit and easy to assemble. Also... the color... can't beat it :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I too was very happy with the quality and great price
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased as a gift for my daughter in law and she was thrilled with it. I too was very happy with the quality and great price.
customer_reviews.author: tamlyn

customer_reviews.title: I love it if it were not chopped or the doors crooked
customer_reviews.text: To begin with the box arrived busted. The doors are not even, there’s a chip on the top and the knobs are not straight. I really was excited about this purchase and I’d really like replace it. I have my jewelry in it and need to unload when a new one arrives is that possible?
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Tarrant

customer_reviews.title: Got as a gift for my daughter but she picked ...
customer_reviews.text: Got as a gift for my daughter but she picked it out. She really likes it, functional, adds alittle diff of color to her room......:)
customer_reviews.author: SportyP

customer_reviews.title: Pricey and not able to lock
customer_reviews.text: A beautiful piece, but doors don’t line up perfectly, will never be able to lock it. Little expensive for it not to work properly. Didn’t want to go through the hassle of returning it, since it is not small and comes in a huge box.
customer_reviews.author: michele

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and spacious
customer_reviews.text: My husband got this for me for Christmas and I love it...fits all my jewelry and just gorgeous.
customer_reviews.author: lakemama

customer_reviews.title: Get it
customer_reviews.text: Ordered for my life. She loved it, she was able to put all of her jewelry in it. It's well made and made the wife happy.
customer_reviews.author: Ricky Stinnett

customer_reviews.title: lock is not working and is all scratch
customer_reviews.text: I am trying to find customer service... and so far no one can tell me anything... I might need to just return it...
customer_reviews.author: Magdala

customer_reviews.title: THE perfect jewelry armoire
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking for something bigger to hold all my jewels but this went overboard in the best way! it has multiple drawers & a beautiful mirror. the top part arrived damaged but Hive & honey has great customer service & replaced it very quickly!
customer_reviews.author: RAFAEL A GRANADOS

customer_reviews.title: Super nice jewelry cabinet.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very well built unit. Nice locks that work. It fits the bill. Wife loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be sturdy after a few months of use
customer_reviews.text: Wife likes it. Seems to be sturdy after a few months of use.plenty of space for her jewelry. Finish good and as described.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Deluxe

customer_reviews.title: The drawers are not trusted when opening.
customer_reviews.text: i like the cabinet itself and the color. It is good sized. The drawers when pulling out they lean down/forward and everything almost falls out of the drawers. The drawers should be firm and stay at a 90 degree angle when opened.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my gf and she loves it. Comes assembled and packaged really well protected. Only thing u have to do is screw on the top
customer_reviews.author: D$w

customer_reviews.title: Happy happy happy
customer_reviews.text: I am extremely happy with this product, there is plenty of storage space inside, the color is great !! Easy to assemble !!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble all you have to do is attach legs. Came well packaged and in perfect condition. Lots of storage space. No strong smell as I saw in other reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well crafted
customer_reviews.text: I love my cabby! I love the color, the drawers,the lock. I had this in my cart for months and I am thrilled i finally got it!
customer_reviews.author: lisa weir

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful jewelry cabinet/armoire
customer_reviews.text: Beautifully made. The color is very nice and the quality is that of a well made cabinet to keep jewelry. Like it and recommend.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely beautiful! LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely beautiful! LOVE IT! I read that some had trouble putting it together or some damage. NO problems with mine! It’s perfect!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Coleman

customer_reviews.title: I love this! Arrived well packaged and on time
customer_reviews.text: I love this! Arrived well packaged and on time, fairly easy to put together myself. Wish I didn't have to open top lid to get the doors open everytime, as the top lid with the mirror is quite heavy, but that's pretty minor. Holds all my jewelry well.
customer_reviews.author: Brittny Borgeson

product_meta.title: Hives and Honey Cabby Fully Locking Jewelry Armoire, 40" x 19" x 13.75", Turquoise
product_meta.description: Color:TurquoiseHave you been looking for a fully locking jewelry armoire … Well look no further! The Cabby Jewelry Armoire is the kind of furniture piece that makes you excited to get dressed up. Not only is it pretty to have around, this jewelry storage solution neatly organizes all the accessories you own - including necklaces, earrings, rings, and more. The rich turquoise color is complemented by an antiqued finish, while the inside is fully lined in an attractive natural linen. The French-style doors with bronze hardware open to reveal seven divided storage drawers. On the top, the hinged lid lifts to a convenient mirror and more storage. On the side, you’ll find 10 necklace hooks in each. The Cabby has so much space available, you might need to start shopping for more jewelry pieces to fill it!
feature_bullets: Plush Felt Lining Throughout the Armoire Protects Jewelry from Tarnish, Scratching and Other Potential Damage.
Armoire Is Fully Locking, Ensuring That All Of Your Beautiful Treasures Remain Safely Tucked Away
French Style Doors Open To Reveal 8 Double-Tiered Necklace Hooks On Each Side
Top Lid Lifts To Reveal Divided Compartments, Ring Rolls And A Full Frame Mirror
Fully Assembled, Just Screw On Legs

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars290 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
specifications.Fabric Type: Plush Felt Lining Throughout the Armoire Protects Jewelry from Tarnish, Scratching and Other Potential Damage.
specifications.Included Components: Mirror, Lock & Key, Drawers, Necklace Hooks, Ring Rolls
